item.title: How Not to Measure Elapsed Time
item.description: The rabbit hole goes infinitely deep if you want to do latency measurements, benchmarking, and performance testing/tuning/analysis. They are very hard to do right and it is very easy to mess them up. In this post, I would like to show you a very common mistake (that is just 0.000001â€° of the tip of the iceberg) and an extremely simple solution to fix it.
